agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Environmental Regulation TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Tuesday, April 2, 2019 PLACE: E1.010 CHAIR: Rep. J. M. Lozano The order in which bills are heard is at the discretion of the chair. Public testimony may be limited to three (3) minutes. The committee will meet to hear public testimony on the following: HB 990 Gutierrez | et al. Relating to a study by the Texas Water Development Board and the Texas Commission on Environmental Quality regarding the effects of the construction of a border wall on storm drainage and other environmental matters in this state. HB 1346 Thompson, Ed Relating to the eligibility requirements for the diesel emissions reduction incentive program. HB 1746 Lozano Relating to sources of funding and administration of the Texas emissions reduction plan. HB 3045 Nevárez Relating to the provision of solid waste disposal services in the extraterritorial jurisdiction of certain municipalities. HB 3224 Lozano Relating to the creation of a defense under the Solid Waste Disposal Act for persons engaged in certain recycling transactions. HB 4116 Zwiener Relating to a voluntary financial assurance program for permit holders under the National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
